info.name: SiberianFox
info.description: A white theme with shade and shadow qualities.
info.additionalInfo: This theme was optimized for Firefox 11, 12 (beta), 13 (aurora), and 14 (the nightly build).  It will work in lower versions starting from Firefox 4 and above but won't look as good as it does on FF 11.  I will do my best to keep it updated as Firefox versions continue to rise.
